questions: Hello! I can be your guide through the integration process with WorldPay! First question - do you have a e-commerce website?
Great! Next question, do you have a brick and mortar store?
Okay great, are you by chance a restaurant or quick serve establishment? Or neither?
Awesome! Almost there! Would you like to accept mobile payments? (EG ApplePay or GooglePay?)
Almost there - real quick, what's your email address? (We promise not to sell it)
Great! Now let's find the perfect terminal for you! Would you like your customers to pay at the table?
Congratulations! It appears an integration to WorldPay IP combined with the Ingenico Move 5000 will serve your business the best! Click here to get started in our sandbox!
